Class CardModel.cardDeck

java.lang.Object
CardModel.cardDeck
public class CardModel.cardDeck
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a controller for what we call a Deck. It is handling the base deck array, discard deck array, and right now has the direction handling as well, although that may change in the future.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.List<GameView.card> discard
    An empty array that will represent the discard deck of the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CardModel.cardDeck()
    Default constructor that will already have the discard and base deck, then it will set the direction to the right.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void dealCard​(java.util.List<GameView.card> deck, java.util.List<GameView.card> hand, int numberToDeal)
    Take a card from the deck that was given and adds it to a player's hand.
    java.util.List<GameView.card> getBaseDeck()  
    void shuffleDeck​(java.util.List<GameView.card> cardsToShuffle)
    Takes a pile of cards and shuffles them randomly, the method used is the Fischer-Yates shuffle.
    void startDeck()
    Starts the base deck with all the colors, actions, and wild cards.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      An empty array that will represent the discard deck of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • CardModel.cardDeck

      public CardModel.cardDeck()
      Default constructor that will already have the discard and base deck, then it will set the direction to the right.

  • Method Details

    • getBaseDeck

      public java.util.List<GameView.card> getBaseDeck()
      Returns:
      The base deck of UNO

    • startDeck

      public void startDeck()
      Starts the base deck with all the colors, actions, and wild cards. This should all add up to 108 cards.

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck​(java.util.List<GameView.card> cardsToShuffle)
      Takes a pile of cards and shuffles them randomly, the method used is the Fischer-Yates shuffle.
      Parameters:
      cardsToShuffle - the pile of cards that will be shuffled randomly

    • dealCard

      public void dealCard​(java.util.List<GameView.card> deck, java.util.List<GameView.card> hand, int numberToDeal)
      Take a card from the deck that was given and adds it to a player's hand. This will decrement the card from the deck.
      Parameters:
      deck - the pile of cards that are still faced down
      hand - the player's hand
